description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. He tells a tale of deep sorrow and concern for the welfare of the family he has left behind. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000983; Stories from the Jewish Community; Active; 2007
